sentence.Network_en: Who got his hindquarters pecked to make you radiant, huh?
sentence.Network_cn: 是谁为了让你成为瑞光猪不惜让自己的屁股被啄烂, 啊?

sentence.Network_en: Angulation of hindquarters should be in balance with forequarters.
sentence.Network_cn: 后躯角度应与前躯平衡.

sentence.Network_en: The gait combines good forward reach and strong drive in the hindquarters.
sentence.Network_cn: 步态结合了良好的前躯伸展和强大的后躯驱动力.

Steep , poorly angulated hindquarters are a serious fault ., 过于倾斜和缺乏角度的后腿及臀部都是严重的缺点.

disqualifications White body splashes , which means white on body between withers and tail , on sides between elbows and back of hindquarters in all colors .失格：身体有白斑，意味着不管是什么颜色，在马肩隆之后，尾巴之前，两侧肘部到后背及臀部等地方的颜色出现白色。
hindquarter 后躯肉块, hindquarters 后半身, hindquarter 腿臀部

list.abs: only a straight horse can transmit the hindquarter movement into the rider's hands through arched back and neck .只有直的马，才能通过弯曲的背和脖子，把后肢的运动传递到骑手手中。

entry.def: The hindquarters of a four-legged animal are its back part, including its two back legs.

means.word_mean: 1. the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on;

sentences.sentence: "he deserves a good kick in the butt"
"are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?"

means.word_mean: 2. the part of a quadruped that corresponds to the human buttocks
